fallbackPhrase.content: Sorry, I don't understand what you're saying. Would you like some help?

failurePhrase.content: You gave the wrong response, which means you failed the challenge. Would you like to restart?

failureRePromptPhrase.content: Sorry, I don't understand what you're saying. Would you like to try again?

wonRePromptPhrase.content: Sorry, I don't understand what you're saying. Are you ready to start?

twoMistakesLeftPhrase.content: Oops, you made a mistake! You can only make two more mistakes!

lastMistakePhrase.content: Aww, that was your third mistake! Too bad...

twoMistakesLeftTooLongPhrase.content: Sorry, you answered too late! I'm counting it as a mistake. Two more and you fail!

oneMistakeLeftTooLongPhrase.content: Hmm, that answer was late! You can only make one more mistake!

lastMistakeTooLongPhrase.content: You answered after the time limit ended! That was your third mistake, I'm afraid.

selectMissionPhrase.content: Sensei is ready to train you in the Path of Chef, Path of Sumo, or Path of Guru. Which one would you like?

selectMissionToRemovePhrase.content: Sensei is ready to train you in the Path of Chef, Path of Sumo, or Path of Guru. Enter the path before remove it?

missionAlreadyCompletePhrase.content: You have already completed this path. Finish all 3 paths to complete the game.

severalValuesPhrase.content: Sorry, we can't understand your answer. Please, choose one from this list

missionSelectionPhrase.content: Would you like to try a different path?

wantExitPhrase.content: Do you want to quit the game?

repeatLastPhrase.content: I don't understand you. Please, repeat last command.

returnToGamePhrase.content: You'll be returned to game process.

wantResetProgressPhrase.content: If you restart now, you’ll lose your progress on this mission. You can start this mission over, or start a new mission. Which would you like?

wantMissionFromBeginningPhrase.content: Do you want to start the path from the beginning?

newMissionOrSelectPhrase.content: Do you want to chose another path?

redirectedToSelectMissionPhrase.content: You will be redirected to path selection.

perfectActivityEarnLowPhrase.content: That was a perfect challenge! You earned a new title - Skilled Chef!

perfectStripeEarnLowPhrase.content: You earned that belt without messing up once! You get a new title - Pro Chef!

perfectMissionEarnLowPhrase.content: A perfect path of the chef? Incredible! You get the best  title - The Unmatched Chef!

perfectActivityEarnMidPhrase.content: A challenge with no mistakes! You earned a new title - Giant Sumo!

perfectStripeEarnMidPhrase.content: Hey, did you get that belt without a single wrong response? Wow! You get a new title - Enormous Sumo!

perfectMissionEarnMidPhrase.content: Unbelievable! A perfect Path of the Sumo! You get the best title - The Humongous Sumo!

perfectActivityEarnHighPhrase.content: Nice! No mistakes that challenge! You get a new title - Wise Guru!

perfectStripeEarnHighPhrase.content: No way! A perfect belt! You get a new title - Sage Guru!

perfectMissionEarnHighPhrase.content: Impossible! A perfect Path of the Guru! You get the best title - The Enlightened Guru!

purchaseUnavailable.content: That is not available, do you want to continue with one of the available activities?

purchaseWhat.content: You can purchase the expansion pack and get access to 3 more belts for each of the 3 paths. Would you like to learn more?

purchaseUpsell.content: If you want to see what's next in your adventures with Ben, you can buy the expansion pack, with three more belts in each of the 3 paths! Want to learn more?

purchaseCancel.content: In the future you can purchase the expansion pack by saying “what can I buy”. For now, do you want to try one of the available belts again?

purchaseUnsuccessful.content: We couldn't complete the purchase. You can always ask me how to get more levels later. Want to try one of the available belts again?

playAgainRePrompt.content: Want to try one of the available belts again?

purchaseError.content: Sorry, looks like the store is closed for now. Want to try one of the available belts again?

purchaseDeclined.content: Sorry, your purchase was declined.  Do you want to try again later or do you want to reset this belt's progress and start from the beginning?

purchaseWait.content: While you wait, would you like to take another crack at one of the available belts again?

purchaseComplete.content: Congrats, your purchase was completed! Would you like to continue your adventure with the new available belt?

purchaseCompleteRePrompt.content: Would you like to continue your adventure with the new available belt?

purchaseHistory.content: Thanks for buying the expansion pack. Would you like to try one of the new belts out?

purchaseHistoryRePrompt.content: You asked me for what you've bought. It was the expansion pack with new belts. Would you like to try out the new belt challenges?

purchaseHistoryNothing.content: You haven't purchased the expansion pack with exciting new belts yet.  To do so, say: Buy expansion pack.  Otherwise, say yes to return to the adventure.

purchaseHistoryNothingRePrompt.content: You asked about what you bought, but you haven't purchased anything yet. You can say - what can I buy, or say yes to return to the adventure.

unrecognized.content: I didn't catch that. What can I help you with?

purchaseNothing.content: There are no products available for purchase right now. Sorry about that. Would you like to return to the main menu?

purchaseNoRefund.content: You haven't purchased the expansion pack yet. You can say - what can I buy, or say yes to return to the adventure.

purchaseRefundNotPurchasable.content: There are no purchases to refund. Now, let's get back to the adventure.

purchaseAlreadyOwn.content: You already own the expansion pack. Would you like to pick out a path to follow?

purchasePending.content: I've asked for permission to purchase the expansion pack. In the meantime, would you like to choose a different path, or to reset this path?

purchaseHistoryPending.content: I've asked for permission to purchase the expansion pack. In the meantime, would you like to select a new path to follow?

purchaseWhatPending.content: I've asked for permission to purchase the expansion pack. In the meantime, would you like to select a new path to follow?

unknownRequest.content: Sorry, I am not sure. What can I help you with?
